name: data.iledefrance-mobilites.fr
description: Official data catalog and open data portal for Île-de-France Mobilités, providing over sixty datasets about public transport in the Île-de-France region, with downloadable files and APIs, including network structure, timetables, stops, and equipment status.

geotopics.description: Transport networks, routes, stops, and infrastructure
Geographical boundaries of stops and regions
Information dissemination, APIs for real-time data
